com.amazonaws.mobileconnectors.cognito.internal.storage

Interface RemoteDataStorage

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CognitoSyncStorage

    public interface RemoteDataStorage
    The interface of remote storage of Dataset.

        Gets a list of DatasetMetadatas.
        Returns:
        a list of dataset metadata
        Throws:

      • getDatasetMetadata

        DatasetMetadata getDatasetMetadata(java.lang.String datasetName)
                            throws DataStorageException
        Retrieves the metadata of a dataset.
        Parameters:
        datasetName - dataset name
        Returns:
        the corresponding metadata
        Throws:
        DataStorageException

      • listUpdates

        RemoteDataStorage.DatasetUpdates listUpdates(java.lang.String datasetName,
                                             long lastSyncCount)
                                      throws DataStorageException
        Gets a list of records which have been updated since lastSyncCount (inclusive). If the value of a record equals null, then the record is deleted. If you pass 0 as lastSyncCount, the full list of records will be returned.
        Parameters:
        datasetName - the dataset name
        lastSyncCount - non negative long integer
        Returns:
        A list of records which have been updated since lastSyncCount.
        Throws:
        DataStorageException

      • putRecords

        java.util.List<Record> putRecords(java.lang.String datasetName,
                                  java.util.List<Record> records,
                                  java.lang.String syncSessionToken,
                                  java.lang.String deviceId)
                           throws DatasetNotFoundException,
                                  DataConflictException
        Post updates to remote storage. Each record has a sync count. If the sync count doesn't match what's on the remote storage, i.e. the record is modified by a different device, this operation throws ConflictException. Otherwise it returns a list of records that are updated successfully.
        Parameters:
        datasetName - the dataset name
        records - list of records to be updated remotely
        syncSessionToken - the sync session token retrieved from listUpdates(String, long)
        deviceId - the string deviceId for use with push sync updates, null otherwise
        Throws:
        DatasetNotFoundException
        DataConflictException

      • unsubscribeFromDataset

        void unsubscribeFromDataset(java.lang.String datasetName,
                            java.lang.String deviceId)
        Unsubscribes the user from receiving notifications from a dataset they had been previously subscribed to.
        Parameters:
        datasetName - the name of the dataset to be unsubscribed from
        deviceId - the id of the device to unsubscribe

      • subscribeToDataset

        void subscribeToDataset(java.lang.String datasetName,
                        java.lang.String deviceId)
        Subscribes the user to update notifications for a dataset. This should only be called after the device has been registered.
        Parameters:
        datasetName - the name of the dataset to be subscribed to
        deviceId - the id of the device to subscribe

      • deleteDataset

        Deletes a dataset.
        Parameters:

        Throws:
        DatasetNotFoundException
